title: What may be the problem?
content:
Hi,

I have encountered with a strange problem. While working on a new font, when I installed a font for testing it shows strange positioning problems as in image Tahree114

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113950im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Tahreer114_5093.jpg)

But when I change the zoom size or font size there is no such problem as shown in Tahree150 below

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113950im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Threer150_5441.jpg)

I am using FontLab and MS Volt.

Best regards,  
Atif
author: Atif

comments.content:
Hmm, could it be a hinting problem?

Have you checked your alignment zones and bluescale? Perhaps they are telling some details not to overshoot at a specific point size. I dont know arabic but it looks like a detail on the first example could infact be there but has been pressed up to the baseline because of such hinting instructions.
